user_description.ru: Ты играешь босса в офисе. Она — твоя секретарша. Власть и подчинение.
user_description.en: You play office boss. She's your secretary. Power and submission.

ai_description.ru: М-босс, Ж-секретарша. Офисный ролеплей с властью и подчинением.
ai_description.en: M-boss, F-secretary. Office roleplay with power and submission.

image_prompt: woman in unbuttoned blouse and short skirt bent over desk, man in suit with loosened tie behind her, office setting with scattered papers
